All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BackgroundPanel
This class is a panel used as windows' background
BackMenuButton
It's the button that sends to the MainMenu page, it's present in every window
CashFrame
This class is the graphical interface of the Cash desk, who manages the receipts and the payments
CheckBoxPopup
This class is the popup opened after the selection of the table in CookFrame, allow the cooker to view the order to prepare and remove them
ChefFrame
This class is the graphical interface of the Chef, who manages the menu in the restaurant
CookFrame
This class is the graphical interface of the Cookeer, who manages the Orders to prepare and prepared
Dish
This class creates and manages a dish
DishMenu
this class creates and manages an ArrayList of dishes as if it were a menu
FrameTest
it tries to open all the frames and returns false in case there are errors
Main
Main of the program, it's a menu where the user can choose the role
MainMenu
 
MainTest
this class directs the execution of the tests
MenuTest
this class tests the proper functioning of the class app.backend.Dish and app.backend.DishMenu
NumberField
this class is a TextField in which you can write only number
Order
This class creates and describes an order
OrderManager
This class manages the orders inserts an ArrayList
OrderManagerTest
this class tests the correct functioning of the order manager class
OrderPreview
this class extends the Order class by adding the quantity attribute to be able to count the same orders
PreviewsRegister
this class manages an OrderPreview ArrayList to count the same orders, increment or decrement them
Receipt
This class creates and manages a receipt
ReceiptTest
this class generates a receipt and compares the text with the expected text, then checks that there are no errors while saving the receipt
StandardFrame
This class is a standard frame with attributes in common to the other windows
TableButton
 
TablesPanelColored
This class is a Panel that contains all the tables that has some order to prepare
WaiterFrame
This class is the graphical interface of the Waiter, who manages the Orders: sends order to prepare and removes those delivered
